author: jelbourn
message:
docs: clarify that support schedule is subject to change (#40770)

Initially raised due to #39509, this change updates our
"Support policy and schedule" with the same disclaimer
from the "Release frequency" section above.

PR Close #40770

files.patch:
@@ -70,7 +70,7 @@ We work toward a regular schedule of releases, so that you can plan and coordina
-Disclaimer: Dates are offered as general guidance and will be adjusted by us when necessary to ensure delivery of a high-quality platform. +Dates are offered as general guidance and are subject to change.
@@ -90,7 +90,13 @@ This cadence of releases gives eager developers access to new features as soon a {@a support} ## Support policy and schedule -All of our major releases are supported for 18 months. +
+ +Dates are offered as general guidance and are subject to change. + +
+ +All major releases are typically supported for 18 months. * 6 months of *active support*, during which regularly-scheduled updates and patches are released.
